Header.name: Kochapas Santibut (Allen)
Header.title: Full-Stack Developer
Header.description: Experienced coder proficient in multiple programming languages since 2014.
Header.subDescription: Originally from Bangkok, Thailand. Seeking opportunities to utilize my skills and expertise to enhance quality of life and promote workplace efficiency.

tasks.1: Developed web applications on the Shopify platform utilizing Node.js for the backend and React.js for the frontend.
tasks.2: Designed and maintained databases using GraphQL and PostgresQL.
tasks.3: Helped to train and onboard new employees.
tasks.4: Conducted code reviews and provided feedback to other team members to ensure code quality and consistency.
tasks.5: Conduct analysis and offer insights on the company's applications to enhance efficiency, as well as strategize the timeline for implementing improvements.

tasks.1: Design, code, test, and report windows/web applications based on requirements. Specialize in C# language.
Volunteered with the Mamoru team to develop a website that promotes global sustainability.
tasks.2: Utilized React.js to build the frontend, provided code reviews, and mentorship to junior team members.

tasks.1: Collaborated with a coding instructor in a coding bootcamp, providing guidance and mentorship to students on website development using Ruby on Rails.

Interests.title: Interests
Interests.content: Cooking, Puzzle, Hiking, Physical Fitness, Photography, Travelling, Video Games, DIY Projects

goSub.name: Go SubscRide
goSub.description: An application that operates on the Shopify platform and is designed to assist merchants in managing their customers' subscription contracts. While I was employed at GO RIDE, I was closely involved in implementing new features and maintaining the application.

stripe.name: Stripe Migration Application
stripe.description: An application designed to assist merchants in migrating their customers' payment information from the Stripe platform to the Shopify platform. I developed a customized application to assist my team members in avoiding repetitive tasks during the store migration process.

mamoru.name: mamoru.earth
mamoru.description: An application that promotes sustainability and fosters a connection between a business and its target consumers. I choose to work with them voluntarily in order to contribute to creating a better world for future generations.

barcSnap.name: BarcSnap
barcSnap.description: An application that I developed alongside my teammates during our coding bootcamp. The primary objective of this application is to assist foreigners who are traveling or residing in a foreign country where they cannot read the local language. BarcSnap enables them to scan the barcode of a product and receive detailed information about it, even if they cannot read the product's name.
